official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to carry out beach nourishment on the shoreline of the Gulf of Mexico in Matagorda County, Texas.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to periodically carry out beach nourishment on the shoreline of the Gulf of Mexico in the vicinity of Sargent Beach in Matagorda County, Texas.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to carry out beach nourishment on the shoreline of the Gulf of Mexico in Matagorda County, Texas.
